adalreadyblocked.description: on the ad report page, telling a user there is nothing to do
adalreadyblocked.message: Ničesar ne rabite storiti, saj je oglas že blokiran

adblock_auto_removes_ads_thats_all.description: Install page: explaining how to use adblock.
adblock_auto_removes_ads_thats_all.message: AdBlock samodejno odstrani oglase.  To je vse.

adblock_is_paused.message: AdBlock je izklopljen. Zato ne uporablja sredstev, torej si te strani ni mogoče ogledati. Ponovno vklopite AdBlock in poskusite ponovno.

adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.description: Message displayed when the whitelister dialog will whitelist part of an entire website, for example '*.google.com/reader/*'.  The URL will appear on the next line.
adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.message: AdBlock ne bo deloval na spletni strani, ki se ujema:

adreport2.description: Instructions on ad reporting page. 'Customize' should be the same text as the 'tabcustomize' message.
adreport2.message:
Ste pravkar našli oglas na spletni strani? Pomagali vam bomo poiskati mesto, kjer lahko oglas prijavite.
Zapomnite si: poročanje oglasov je prostovoljno. Če tega ne želite storiti, lahko samo zaprete to okno in oglas blakirate le za sebe. To lahko storite z dodajanjem kriterija za blokiranje oglasov v zavihku 'Prilagodi'.

advanced_options.message: Sem napreden uporabnik, želim videti dodatne nastavitve.

any_new_tabs_you_open_Will_be_automatica.message: Iz vseh zavihkov, ki jih boste odprli, bodo samodejno odstranjeni oglasi.

appliedwhenbrowsing.message: Ta kriterij za blokiranje oglasov bo bil dodan med uporabo brskalnika:

blacklistclickmessage.description: Message at the top of the blacklist options tab
blacklistclickmessage.message: Če želite blokirati oglas, kliknite nanj z desno miškino tipko -- ali pa ga ročno blokirajte tukaj.

blacklisterblockedelement.description: Tells the user what the blocked element is on the slider page

blacklisterblocksalloftype.description: Warns the user that all elements of type X will be blocked
blacklisterblocksalloftype.message: Pozor: ta kriterij blokira vse $elementtype$ na tej strani!

blacklistereditfilter.description: Text if the user wants to manually edit a filter.  'OK' is the standard javascript popup button text.
blacklistereditfilter.message: Prosimo, da spodaj vnesete pravilni kriterj in kliknete 'Vredu'

blacklistereditinvalid1.description: Messagebox if the manually edited filter is invalid. Error messages are not translated.

blacklistermatches.description: Tells the user multiple matches were found
blacklistermatches.message: To ustreza $matchcount$ elementom na tej strani.

blacklisternofilter.description: Warning if the user hasn't specified a filter

blacklisternotsure.description: Blacklister attribute choosing page message.  'Block it!' must be the same as the text of the 'buttonblockit' message.

blacklisteroptions1.message: Kaj mislite, kaj bo veljalo za blokirani oglas, ko boste naslednjič obiskali to spletno stran?

blacklisteroptionstitle.message: Zadnji korak: Kaj ta oglas stori?

blacklistersinglematch.description: Tells the user only one match was found
blacklistersinglematch.message: To ustreza 1 elementu na tej strani.

blacklisterthefilter.message: Kriteriji za blokiranje oglasov, ki jih lahko spremenite na strani z nastavitvami:

blacklisterwarningnofilter.description: Warns the user that no filter was specified

block_by_url_instead.message: Napredno: blokiraj raje po URL naslovu

blockanadtitle.description: Title of the first two dialogs of the blacklister

blockdomain.description: Message of the url and css -blocking area
blockdomain.message: Domena spletne strani, na kateri želite to uveljaviti

blockurlwithtext.message: Blokirajte URL-je, ki vsebujejo to besedilo

buttonback.description: Back to previous wizard page button

buttonexclude.description: Button for excluding a domain in the whitelister dialog

cantblockflash.description: Result of the final ad report question
cantblockflash.message: Trenutno ni možno blokirati oglasov v Flashu ali v drugih vtičnikih. Čakamo na podporo s strani Googla in Webkita.

cantblockflashwarning.description: Text of the final ad report question
cantblockflashwarning.message: Ali se oglas prikaže v ali pred videoposnetkom oz. v kakršnemkoli drugem vtičniku? (npr.: Flash igra)

casesensitive.message: Ta filter je občutljiv na velike in majhne črke:

changelabel.description: link to change resources on the resourceblock page

checkinfirefox.description: tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in firefox
checkinfirefox.message: Preverite v spletnem brskalniku Mozilla Firefox

checkinfirefox1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad
checkinfirefox1.message: Prosimo namestite Mozilla Firefox v primeru, da tega brskalnika še nimate.

checkinfirefox2.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad
checkinfirefox2.message: Prosimo nametite Adblock Plus za Mozilla Firefox v primeru, da tega še niste storili.

checkinfirefox3.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad
checkinfirefox3.message: V Mozilla Firefox-u se naročite na iste kriterije za blokiranje oglasov kot tukaj (ne naročite se na 'AdBlock po meri' kriterije za blokiranje).

checkinfirefox4.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad
checkinfirefox4.message: V Mozilla Firefoxu, pojdite na spletno stran z tem oglasom.

checkinfirefox5.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad
checkinfirefox5.message: Se ta oglas prikaže tudi v brskalniku Mozilla Firefox?

chromebutton_how_to_hide.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button.  'Hide Button' should match the text that Chrome displays when you right click a toolbar button.
chromebutton_how_to_hide.message: Če želite skriti gumb, desno kliknite nanj in izberite 'Skrij gumb'. Lahko ga ponovno pokažate pod Nastavitve | Orodja | Razširitve.

cleanuplist.description: Option at the bottom of the third options tab

click_extensions.description: Second step to turn on autoupdate, after opening Safari -> Preferences.

click_install_update_automatically.description: Last step to turn on autoupdate, after opening Safari -> Preferences -> Extensions -> Updates.

click_safari_prefs.description: First step to turn on autoupdate.  ⇒ makes a right arrow (->).

click_updates.description: Third step to turn on autoupdate, after opening Safari -> Preferences -> Extensions.

clickthead.description: When you have to click the ad to continue
clickthead.message: Kliknite na oglas in program vas bo vodil skozi postopek blokiranja.

clickupdatefilters.message: Kliknite: Posodobi moje kriterije za blokiranje oglasov!

correctfilters.description: on the ad report page, label describing having the right set of filters

debuginlogoption.message: Želite, da program prikazje 'debug' izkaze v dnevniku zapisov od konzole? (to bo upočasnilo AdBlock)

description1.message: Najbolj popularna razširitev za brskalnik Google Chrome, z več kot 1,5 miljona uporabnikov! Blokira oglase po vsem spletu.

did_you_know_this_is_my_full_time_job.description: Text of a payment request link
did_you_know_this_is_my_full_time_job.message: Ali ste vedeli, da je to moja služba?

disabled_by_filter_lists.description: Message shown when a user tries to unwhitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list.
disabled_by_filter_lists.message: Oprostite, AdBlock je onemogočen na tej spletni strani s strani enega izmed vaših kriterijev za blokiranje oglasov.

disabled_on_this_page.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that have been whitelisted.
disabled_on_this_page.message: AdBlock je onemogočen na tej spletni strani.

done.description: Install page: appended to the 'installing_adblock' message once the progress bar reaches 100%

dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.description: Menu entry to open the whitelist wizard.
dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.message: Ne izvajaj na straneh pod to domeno

dont_run_on_this_page.description: Menu entry to whitelist a page

enable.description: Link text to un-whitelist a page, displayed immediately after 'disabled_on_this_page'.

excludedomainorurl.message: Domena ali spletni naslov, kjer AdBlock naj ne izvaja blokiranja

excludefilterremoved.description: Warning when a page exclusion rule was removed in resourceblock.html
excludefilterremoved.message: Ta kriterij za blokiranje oglasov je bil odstranjen. Prosimo, osvežite izvirno stran za ustvarjanje seznama z viri.

failedtofetchfilter.message: Posodobitev tega kriterija je bila neuspešna!

faq.description: Text of link to a page with answers to frequently asked questions.  The capitalization should be the same as for the 'help' and 'project_home' messages

filecleanerwarning.description: Help for users who use hyperactive file cleaners
filecleanerwarning.message: Če vidite to sporočilo vsakič, ko zaženeta AdBlock, prosimo poskrbite, da ne uporabljate odstranjevalca datotek, ki izbriše tudi datoteke 'localStorage'.

filteradblock_custom.message: AdBlock-ovi poljubni kriteriji za blokiranje oglasov (priporočeno)

filterhasbeenadded.description: resourceblocking page string (the 'slash n' is a line break)
filterhasbeenadded.message:
Kriterij za blokiranje oglasov je bil uspešno dodan!
Osvežite stran, da vidite rezultat!

filterlistlink.message: Ne naročajte več kriterijv za blokiranje oglasov, kot jih potrebujete -- vsak malo upočasni brskanje! Avtorje in druge sezname lahko najdete tukaj.

filterlistsrock.description: Header text on the Customize tab.  'Filter lists' should be the same text as the tabfilterlists message.
filterlistsrock.message: Kriteriji za blokiranje oglasov blokirajo večino oglasov na spletnih straneh. Lahko pa tudi:

filtersavewarning.message:
Pozor: če tukaj storite napako, je možnost, da mnogi drugi kriteriji za blokiranje oglasov (vključno z uradnimi) ne bodo delovali!
Preberite 'syntax' navodila za kriterije za blokiranje oglasov , če želite izvedeti, kako dodati napredne kriterije na 'Črno listo' in/ali na 'Belo listo'.

filterstabtitle.description: Title of the filter list tab
filterstabtitle.message: Naročite se na sezname kriterijev za blokiranje

findingads.description: When you press ctrl-shift-K the blacklister searches for ads
findingads.message:
Program trenutno išče oglase...

To bo trajalo le nekaj sekund.

first_turn_on_autoupdate_to_get_bugfixes.description: The first instructions on the Safari install page.
first_turn_on_autoupdate_to_get_bugfixes.message: Predlagamo, da vklopite samodejno posodabljanje pri Nastavitvah brskalnika Safari. Tako boste sproti dobivali popravke in najnovejše različice.

fixityourself.description: telling a user who won't report an ad to us how to handle it for herself
fixityourself.message: V redu. ta oglas lahko še vedno blokirate na strani z nastavitvami. Hvala!

flashads.description: Title of the final ad report question if the ad didn't appear in FF

for_more_options_right_click.description: Install page: explaining how to use adblock in more detail.
for_more_options_right_click.message: Za več možnosti lahko z kliknete desno tipko na spletno stran ali pa kliknite gumb $img$, ki se nahaja na orodni vrstici.

img.example: A small picture of the toolbar button.  Do not translate.

format_site1_site2_site3.description: Example showing users how to input a list of sites on the Customize tab. You can translate the 'news' and 'siteN' but leave the '|'s and '~'s in place.

googletextads.message: Želite, da program oglasov pri zadetkih iskanja na Google.si ne blokira?

help.description: Text of link to a page with fixes to common problems and a list of known issues

hide_this_button.description: Toolbar button menu entry to hide the AdBlock button

i_like_googles_text_ads_dont_block_those.description: Install page text; slightly shorter than the 'googletextads' message.
i_like_googles_text_ads_dont_block_those.message: Rad imam Googlove besedilne oglase: želim, da jih AdBlock ne blokira.

i_pruned_your_subscriptions.description: Explanation of why the user went from over 10 subscribed filter lists to just 4
i_pruned_your_subscriptions.message:
Opozorilo: Naročiti se morate le na sezname, ki so za jezik, ki ga govorite. Naročili ste se na toliko seznamov, da je bil vaš brskalnik nestabilen.

AdBlock vas je samodejno odstranil iz večine, če pa se rsnično želite naročiti na več seznamov, lahko to storite ročno.

installedtitle.description: Title for the installation success page

labelshow.description: The label when you click the 'show links to filter lists' option

linkunblock.message: Pokaži oglase na določeni spletni strani ali domeni

manualfilteredit.message: Ročno uredite narčnine kriterijev za blokiranje oglasov:

no.description: A negative response to a question

nodefaultfilter1.description: instructions on ad report page pointing users to EasyList subscriptions list. 'Customize' should be the same message as 'tabcustomize'.
nodefaultfilter1.message:
Za ta jezik nimamo privzetih kriterijev za blokiranje oglasov.
Prosimo poskusite najti primerne kriterije, ki podpirajo ta jezik $link$ ali pa blokirajte ta oglas le zase na zavihku 'Prilagodi'.

pagelanguagecheck.message: V katerem jeziku je ta spletna stran napisana?

refusetocheck.description: user is telling us they don't wish to investigate something for us

reloadadpage.message: Ponovno naložite spletno stran, ki vsebuje oglas.

removefromlist.description: Label to remove a custom filter

reportfilterlistproblem.description: telling the user to report an ad to a filter list maintainer
reportfilterlistproblem.message: To je napaka v seznamu kriterijev za blokiranje oglasov. Napako sporočite tukaj: $link$

link.example: EXAMPLE 1: John Doe EXAMPLE 2: EasyList forums

reporttous2.description: NOTE: non-English translations should replace the first sentence and instead say 'If you can speak English, you can report the ad to us in the issue tracker.'
reporttous2.message: Podatke o oglasu nam lahko sporoèite sledilnik v težavi$.

retryaftersubscribe.description: instructions on ad report page telling users to subscribe to a filter list and then check again to see whether the ad exists
retryaftersubscribe.message: Naročite se na seznam kriterijev za blokiranje oglasov in nato ponovno poizkusite: $list_title$

showcontextmenus.message: Dodajte elemente na meni, ki se prikaže, ko kliknete desni miškin gumb.

sliderexplanation.message: Premikajte drsnik do točke, ko bo oglas popolnoma blokiran.

subscribingtitle.message: Trenutno poteka postopek naročanja na seznam kriterijev za blokiranje oglasov...

tabfilterlists.description: A tab on the options page

tabgeneral.description: A tab on the options page

translator_credit.description: Credit for your translation with $translator_names$ being your own name below. Multiple names should be separated by a comma.

updatefromoldversion.message: Uporabljate zastarelo različico AdBlock-a. Prosimo, da najprej $updatelink$ AdBlock na najnovejšo rezličico.

updatenowmessage.message: Kriteriji za blokiranje oglasov se posodabljajo samodejno; ne glede na to lahko le te tudi ročno posodobite.

updateyourlists.message: Poskrbite, da bodo vaši kriteriji posodobljeni

yes.description: A positive response to a question
